content: I noticed that the gcongr lemma pow_le_pow_right₀ : 1 ≤ a → m ≤ n → a ^ m ≤ a ^ n has a side condition that doesn't get discharged by positivity, namely 1 ≤ a. Is there another tactic that should be used by gcongr or is this in scope for positivity? I was just playing around with an example and was confused to see the extra goal 1 ≤ 3 appear.
bound is an option that comes to mind
